Reviews.Title: “Adorable hotel in the best area”

Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed atlas hotel 3 nights payed 200 euros special deal nice windows balconies bit issue boyfriend smoke warm cozy perfect hanging walks cold nice king size bed sitting decoration look 3 stars issue bathroom door bathroom niceit bathtub everthing looked perfectly clean door sliding type didnt exactly covered basically flap pushed bottom minimum coverage uncomfortable using bathroombut found tv wasnt bad didnt trying breakfast discovered supermarket 5 minutes hotel called albert heijn local branch found everthing possibly breakfast lunch sandwiches sorts sizes croissants cinnamon rolls cakes bagels sorts breads cheese ham fruit huge selection juices hotel breakfast 750 euros person payed day managed eat try grocery store hotel staff helpful especially girl speaks perfect american helped rid extra fee paying credit card willing help matter searched internet type restaurant looking didnt definitely makes difference recommend hotel priceonly deal
